full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM GYI MAN NGAG STONG GSUM KHYON YANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,TSUL 'DI NI RIG 'DZIN CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS DRAG PO MTHU'I MAN NGAG SNGAGS BSDEBS DANG SRID PA'I GTER KHYIM DU GSUNGS PA LAS BTUS TE BKOD PA YIN NO, ,DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO DANG, ,GSANG YUM MA MO BRTAN MA'I TSOGS, ,ZUNG 'JUG NYI MA GZHON NU LA, ,GTAD DO GNYER RO THUB PAR SRUNGS, ,SNGAGS SMYON BLO GSAL RGYA MTSO YIS, ,SMYON PA BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE LA, ,DRAG SNGAGS SMYON PA'I MTHAR THUG STZAL, ,SMYO RTAGS STON PA'I LAG CHA YIN, ,SA MA YA, ,RGYA RGYA RGYA, ,
